00105 NetParams::NetParams(int argc, char **argv)
00106   : Params( argc, argv )
00107 {
00108     set_format_liberate( );
00109     setDefault( );
00110 
00111     //
00112     // check whether a configuration file is given
00113     //
00114     if( confFile.length( ) > 0 ) {
00115         if( ! scanFrom( confFile ) )
00116             cerr << "error: read failed on configuration file "
00117                  << confFile << endl;

00210 void NetParams::io( istream& is, ostream& os, FileUtil::iotype type )
00211 {
00212     if ( strict == false )
00213     {
